content: trail magic is a granny-stripe crocheted scarf with the row separating to create fringe clever and magical the project was designed the 2024 minnesota yarn shop hop and is suitable for advanced beginners **finished dimensions** 4 wide and 60 long including crocheted fringe after blocking **you ll need** fairy trail kit available at the yarnery includes stumptown dk by polka dot sheep 1 full skein 231 yds 100 g in custom color fairy trail and 3 partial skeins 57 yds 25 g in atlantis beartooth and sage the kit includes yarn enough to add a row of the main color on either side for additional width g 4 mm crochet hook tapestry needle
